thread.section_title: Travelgenio opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Travelgenio | www.travelgenio.com
thread.title: Amira Ashmawy

author: Amira Ashmawy
title: Amira Ashmawy
text: Trying to change a part of my booking. Called them. Was stuck over the phone for almost 30 minutes. Then the line disconnected. Apparently they are not allowed to call their customers. But we have to call them and pay for the privilege of getting nothing done. I will never book with them again and I will put it on my Facebook for all my friends. Unacceptable service.
